contentList.content: Flashblade
A lightning-fast warrior who marks enemies with kunai and teleports to strike them down.
Kunai Points
Energy used to power teleportation and special kunai techniques.
Martial Arts
Your unarmed strikes deal scaling damage based on your Flashblade level.
Unarmored Defense
While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier.
Master of the Flash
Your marks become permanent and teleport abilities cost fewer Kunai Points.
Deflect Missiles
When hit by a ranged weapon attack, reduce the damage.
Substitution
When hit by an attack, use your reaction to force the attack to miss and gain a free teleport.
Chain Flash
You can strike multiple marked targets in rapid succession.
Ricochet Bounce Back
When your kunai ricochets, you deal additional damage.
Ricochet Mastery
You have perfected the art of ricochet attacks.
Chain Reaction
When a volatile mark detonates, it can trigger other nearby marks.
Stillness of Mind
Clear your mind, removing Frightened and Charmed conditions.
Flashblade Mark
Marked by a kunai. The Flashblade can teleport to this target.
Flash Strike
You have Advantage on your next attack roll.
Substitution Escape
Teleport to a nearby location after dodging an attack.
Chain Flash Cooldown
Cannot use Chain Flash again until this expires.
Heightened awareness grants <LSTag Tooltip="ActionPoint">+2 Actions</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">+1 Bonus Action</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Movement">+3m Movement</LSTag> each turn.
Raijin Ready
Your marks are set. You can use <LSTag Tooltip="Rush_FlyingRaijin_Free">Flying Raijin</LSTag> for free this turn.
Marked Kunai
Throw a kunai that marks the target, allowing you to teleport to them.
Kunai Throw
Throw a kunai at an enemy, dealing piercing damage.
Ricochet Kunai
Throw a kunai that bounces between enemies, marking each target hit.
Explosive Kunai
Throw a kunai that explodes on impact, dealing fire damage in an area.
Kunai Barrage
Teleport to a location and unleash a barrage of kunai that ricochet between up to 5 enemies, marking each target.
Chain Kunai Strike
Teleport rapidly between up to 6 enemies in a blink, striking each one with devastating speed.
Flash Step
Instantly teleport to a marked enemy and strike with force energy.
Chidori
Dash forward with lightning speed, dealing lightning damage and preventing the target from taking reactions.
Rasengan
Rush to a marked target and strike with a spiraling sphere of force energy, dealing damage and knocking them back.
Clone Rush
Teleport to an enemy and strike with concentrated force energy.
Phantom Rush

Move ghost-like through the battlefield, passing through enemies to <LSTag Tooltip="FLASHBLADE_MARK">Mark</LSTag> them. Unlocks a free <LSTag Tooltip="Rush_FlyingRaijin_Free">Flying Raijin</LSTag> this turn.
Flying Raijin
Instantly teleport to a marked target at extreme range, striking with devastating force and lightning damage.
Flying Raijin (Free)
Instantly teleport to a <LSTag Tooltip="FLASHBLADE_MARK">Marked</LSTag> target and strike with a Rasengan, dealing Force damage and knocking them back. This use is free after Phantom Rush.
Kunai Scatter
Throw kunai in a wide arc, marking multiple enemies at once.
Shuriken Scatter
Throw shuriken in a cone, hitting all enemies in the area.
Recover Kunai
Recover spent kunai points by removing marks from all enemies.
Smoke Bomb Escape
Throw a smoke bomb, dealing damage to nearby enemies and creating a fog cloud for cover.
Sage Mode

Enter a heightened state of awareness. For 3 turns, gain <LSTag Tooltip="ActionPoint">2 additional Actions</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">1 additional Bonus Action</LSTag> each turn, plus increased movement speed.
Shadow Clone
Create an illusory duplicate that can distract enemies and draw their attacks.
Multi Shadow Clone
Create four illusory duplicates at once to overwhelm your enemies.
Marked For Death
Execute a marked enemy, dealing massive damage based on their missing health.
